name: A Light in the Dark (itch) (SPFab)
description:
This Game was made for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2018. The Theme was: Genre without Mechanics.

It is a short Game about the differences and similaritys of Light and Dark.

The catch: It is a Platformer where you can not see the Platforms. (See the Theme above.) The only way of knowing where you can safely jump to, is to throw a small Sphere and see where it hits a wall.

Because I have so much to do, the development was only 5 hours and there is a lot of stuff I wanted to add, for example better Graphics (I know, sounds wierd, considering the Game is only a black Screen), Sound, more Content and Gameplay Features.

Maybe there will be a Sequel or a Remastered in the Future, where I fletch out the Game, and add all the Stuff I wanted to add.

I hope you have fun. SPFab

Source Code and Unity Project: https://github.com/SPFabGerman/A-Light-in-the-Dark

There will be a development Video in the Future.
